Description: Thank you for visiting our ebay store! This Retro and Exquisite pocket watch brings you back to your memory in those earlier youth memories, Elegant design with precise Quartz movement pocketwatch has an antique feel and an alluring ornament for common and social engagements.This is a very hipster, cool watch that adds a nice touch to any vintage outfit, All makes it a top classic gift choice for a birthday, Christmas, wedding or best man gift Features Elegant design with precise quartz movement Dial color in white with arabic numerals in black Retro styling case surface has light lace detailing on the front and back and looks convincingly vintage. Removable chain with a clip at the end, which is long enough to wear as a necklace or it can be used as a pocket watch Excellent workmanship and durable utilization, We are committed to delivering a wonderful usage experience. Case material: alloy Chain material: alloy Package size/Measurements: Case diameter: approx 1.8cm(4.6inch) Chain length: approx 14.8inch(40cm) Chain width: approx 0.3inch (0.7cm) Case thickness: approx 0.4 inch(1.0cm) Watch weight: approx 1.8oz(51g) Package included: 1 * Pocket watch 1 * Gift box Setting time and maintenance Press the crown at the top of the watch and turn the crown clockwise until reaching the exact time. Daily water resistance(not for showering and swimming The quartz pocketwatch movement is powered by a silver oxide battery, which is easy to access and replace - HIGH QUALITY: Made from high quality alloy external, with top glass back of the watch for view of precise quartz movement - SUITABLE SIZE: Pocket watch case diameter 1.81"(4.6cm). weigh 1.69oz(48g), Antique free chain length 15.74"(40cm) - KEEPING ACCURATE TIME: Easy setting, rotatting, twisting the top button on the spin, Modern quartz movement makes the watch a extremely accurate timekeeper - EXCELLENT DESIGN: The smooth surface finish and delicate-looking give this pocket watch a authentic charm look, It is nicely balancing a vintage charm with modern day convenience - PERFECT GIFT: The quartz pocket watch movement comes with a REATR gift box, a nice present for Dad or birthday present or just for personal use REATR Alloy Pocket Watch with Smooth Surface Pendant Fashion Quartz Watch
